item.description:
This Meetup has changed: This event will be held on Wednesday, November 17 (not November 18)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Announcing a new Meetup for Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club - New England Area!

What: Providence - You need a Wintervention!

When: Wednesday, November 17, 2010 - 9:00pm (film), 7:00pm dinner beforehand

Where: Avon Cinema
260 Thayer Street
Providence, RI, 02906

Wedelns of Southeastern Massachusetts and Rhode Island and Friends - you need a Wintervention

Get ready for Warren Miller's 61st film: Wintervention!

Do you have a skiing or snowboarding problem? Do you always take "just one more" run? If you answered “yes” to either of these, it may be time for a Wintervention. Narrated by skiing icon Jonny Moseley, Warren Miller’s Wintervention is the definitive solution for the snow-obsessed. Wintervention takes riders like Chris Davenport, Jonny Moseley and Lindsey Vonn on a global tour of Alaska, Norway, Canada, Antarctica and beyond… delivering a successful Wintervention for all of us in need. Warren Miller films attract a cult-like following and mark the official start of winter for sports enthusiasts everywhere. Warren Miller premieres are an experience, a party and a phenomenon not to be missed

We'll meet for drinks and a bite to eat beforehand at 7:00pm at
Andreas Restaurant
268 Thayer St, Providence, RI 02906-1343

Showtime: Wednesday, November 17, 2010 - 9:00pm

Ticket Information
Tickets available at The Ski Shop Plus and Ticketmaster. Tickets also available the night of the show at The Avon Cinema Box Office.

Please order your ticket before you RSVP - Yes

See you there!

Brad Doyle
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Brad with Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
item.name: Wintervention: Providence, RI Warren Miller Movie - Wednesday, November 17, 2010
